transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hi sir, main Minakshi bol rahi hu Raju sir.
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Raju sir main IndiaMART se Minakshi, meri team se abhi aapko hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan sir, aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ab aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan sir, sir very good morning, main IndiaMART se Minakshi bol rahi thi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir abhi na aapka mere team se aaj morning mein aapko call kiya gaya tha, aapki jo account manager hai Kohima Naresh, unhone call kiya tha aapko.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To sir maine aapko aapne uske ke baad not satisfied kiya hai pe, to main wohi jaanna chah rahi thi kya aapne ye feedback diya?
Customer: Mam jo mere ko bol ke kaha tha na ki aapke order aayenge, lead aayengi, aapke paas bahar se call aayengi aapse, aisa kuch nahi ho raha, theek hai?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Hapta 10 din ho gaye, ek lead nahi ho paayi cover meri, bahar se phone aane ko kaha tha, khali ek phone aaya jabse mere se ye hua hai. Do mahine kareeb hone wale hai.
Executive: Haan, do mahine aapke profile ko hone wale hai, aapka Delhi se hi hai. Delhi mein aap kahan se ho sir?
Customer: Paschim Vihar.
Executive: Paschim Vihar.
Customer: Paschim Vihar, hmm.
Executive: Okay. Yahan pe to sir aapki profile August se live hui hai, August, hai na? August mein September mein October and November, means teen char mahine ho gaye, aapne jo mere saath renewal karaya hai apna service, woh liya hai aapne, lekin sir main to Raju sir, IndiaMART aapka use kaun karta hai?
Customer: Kaun karta hai use? Hum hi kar rahe hai aur kaun kar raha hai?
Executive: Kahin kahin companies mein team use karti hai, kisi ko rakha hua hai use karne ke liye. Main yahan pe jo dekh rahi hu sir, aapka to har month services use hui hai, 29, 30, 28, 27 din to use hui hai, by lead aap use karte hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To wohi main jaanna chah rahi jaise ki aapne bataya ki mujhe aapko achha response nahi mil raha, but aapka to main engagement part dekhu to aap consume karte ho, aap active ho mere platform pe.
Customer: Active hum to active hai, magar jo order hume chahiye woh to nahi mil pa rahe na mam, act to koi bhi utha lenge bhai, hume lead to khatam karni hai na, lead ko thodi chhodna hai, abhi bhi utha ke mila dete hai magar jo product hai woh hai nahi.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: To aap mujhe ye bataiye, aap mujhe ek cheez ye bataiye ki aapko product ka issue aata hai, matlab product mismatch ka, location ka, quantity ka, kya reason rehta hai jo buyer aapko?
Customer: Quantity to 20, 25, 50 isse zyada quantity to aa nahi rahi. Ab isme kya uthau main, phir bhi main utha leta hu chalo theek hai. Uske baad mein jo product hai jo hum apna product dikhate hai woh product to aa nahi pa raha, aur alag alag tarah ke product aa rahe hai. Unko bhi kuch ek aadhi lead hai jo hum banwa ke de dete hai magar product aise aa rahe hai jo hamare magar jo humne profile mein humne daal rakhe hai unke regarding kyun nahi aate?
Executive: Haan.
Executive: To sir wahan pe jaise ki hum log aapko filter ka option dete hai, to aapne dekha hai wahan pe ki aapko not relevant mark karne ka option dete hai, ek baar video call pe aap aaiye to main aapko thoda sa achhe se guide karu.
Customer: Abhi main free nahi hu mam, abhi kaam kar raha hu main.
Executive: Zyada time nahi lagega sir, 5-10 minute ki activity hai, aapko wohi seller panel pe ya to aap na app open kar lijiye main aapko bata deti hu waise hi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Kar sakte hai sir?
Customer: Haan kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan. Kyunki jo mere ko bola tha na mam, aapke paas ladka aayega, aapke paas lead aayegi, aapke ye hoga, aapka sab kuch kar denge.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aisa kuch nahi hai. Abhi bhi 15, 10, 15 din ho gaye, ek lead consume nahi hui, phone kar le utha raha hu woh baat thodi hai jo hume to product bhej rahe hai us tarah ka to ja hi nahi pa raha.
Executive: Sir ye Paschim Vihar.
Executive: Sir mujhe thoda sa aap ye bataiye kya Paschim Vihar matlab kahan ke aas paas hai aapka?
Customer: Ye Peeragarhi ke paas hai.
Executive: Peeragarhi ke paas hai. Hmm ye kya padta hai? Punjabi Bagh ho gaya, Peeragarhi ho gaya.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Peeragarhi, haan theek hai, meri Peeragarhi mein branch hai, main dekhti hu agar main aapka wahan pe woh kara paati hu, Peeragarhi se aapka kitna dur hoga?
Customer: Bas paas mein hi hai uske.
Executive: Paas mein hi hai, theek hai. Main woh karne ki koshish karti hu ki wahan se ya to sir aap wahan ke office mein bhi aap kabhi chale jaoge na to wahan pe bhi aapko koi assist kar dega, agar aapko nahi nahi ab aap keh rahe ho Peeragarhi ke office mein chale jao, mere ko jab mere se ye plan liya tha tab mere se paise liye the tab kaha tha aapke paas ladka aayega samjha ke jaayega, koi nahi ladka aaya hai mere paas, phir paise lene se matlab nahi nahi nahi jo mam jo bola jata hai woh waisa to hua hi nahi na. Aapke paas daily aapke paas daily lead aayegi, aapke paas daily aayenge, bahar se bhi aayenge call.
Executive: Sir aapko.
Customer: Koi nahi aaya bahar se call, hum hi jo lead lete hai wohi hote hai, bahar se hamare paas ek bhi lead nahi aati.
Executive: Sir main wohi aapko main wohi batana chah rahi hu ki sir dekhiye aapki jo by leads hai na, theek hai, aap by leads IndiaMART pe consume kar rahe ho, theek hai, aapki aapke paas local banda aaya tha lekin aapki jo abhi catalog mere paas hai na woh head office mein hi hai, theek hai, hamara head office Noida 135 mein hai. Pehli cheez, dusri cheez Noida head office mein jab hum log baithte hai na to aapka jo bhi servicing hum customer ki karte hai over the call aur hum aapka video call ke through servicing karte hai, to aapki profile branch mein nahi hai, Peeragarhi branch mein nahi hai, aapki profile head office mein hai, 135 mein, theek hai, to hum log.
Customer: To ye teen char mahine ho gaye to ab char mahine ke baad ab tak aapne Peeragarhi branch mein nahi bheji ab tak aapne phir?
Executive: Sir to main abhi ek internal request daalti hu ki agar aapka pin code mere Peeragarhi ke branch ke nearby serviceable hota hai na, hum log pin code wise karte hai sir servicing. To hum log bhi apne sales team ko 25-30 kilometer ke travelling pe nahi daal sakte na kyunki.
Customer: 25-30 kilometer hai nahi mam, 2 kilometer bhi nahi hai.
Executive: For example bata rahi hu sir, main example bata rahi hu aapko, agar aapka pin code Peeragarhi ke nearby serviceable hai, main aapka request daal de rahi hu.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai, aap is tarike se aap pareshan mat hoiye main daal de rahi hu.
Customer: Pareshan hone wali baat nahi mam, seedhi baat humne main baat hai paise deke fas gaye, ab saal hume jo nikalna hai nikalna hai, ab hume aage interest nahi hai. Isse badhiya order hamare Flipkart, Amazon pe, Shopsy pe aa jate hai jo aapke itne order nahi aate jabki hum kuch nahi de rahe unko aur yahan pe humse ₹28,000 le liye phir bhi hamara kuch nikla nahi ab tak iske andar.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Nahi nahi abhi hum log iska kar rahe hai. Main request daal de rahi hu, aap ek baar aapko uske liye guide kar deti hu by leads ke liye sir, by leads aap open kijiyega. Jahan se aap by leads consume karte hai na woh.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Kar li.
Executive: Theek hai, by leads aapne open kiya, ab by leads open karne pe ab aapko wahan pe option dikhta hai latest aur uska.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Latest by lead, recent by lead, relevant by leads, aise dikh raha hoga.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai, ab dekhiye wahan pe aapko filter ka icon diya hoga wahan pe. Diya filter ka icon?
Customer: Ye 10,000, 50,000, lakh iske andar is wale mein?
Executive: Haan order haan order value ka hai, category ka hai aur location ka hai.
Customer: Kahan hai? Order value hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Order value hai iske aage kahan hai?
Executive: Sir sabse aage category hota hai, location hota hai, recent aur relevant dono tab mein aapko filter ka icon dikhta hai wahan pe.
Customer: Order value hai mam. Order value ke paas hai kahan hai?
Executive: Haan sir.
Executive: Sir usi line mein dekhiye, isiliye aapse video call ka request kar rahi thi, isi se join kar loge, app hi share kar loge na to main aapko bata paungi.
Customer: Ab link bhejo WhatsApp pe.
Executive: WhatsApp pe, aapke registered email aapke phone mein nahi hai?
Customer: Haan email pe bhej do, phone mein nahi main system pe baitha hua hu wahan.
Executive: Haan haan ruk jaaiye. Maine abhi aapko turant hand to hand bheja. Bhej diya sir. Aapke email ID jo hai pe gaya hai calendar.
Customer: Minakshi?
Executive: Yes sir, Minakshi.
Executive: Us usko join kariye.
Executive: Haan ho gaya aapka join, aap apna system se kar rahe ho na?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan main ye phone disconnect kar rahi hu, aapka mic chalega na?
Customer: Nahi nahi chalega.
Executive: Nahi chal raha hai?
Customer: Nahi chalega mam keh to raha hu.
Executive: Are aawaz aa rahi hai mujhe is taraf, phone kaat.
Customer: Mere ko aawaz nahi aa rahi na aapki phir?
Executive: Ab aayegi sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving expected leads or calls.

- Products received do not match profile.

- Dissatisfied with the service after payment.



Resolution:

- Executive offered guidance on using filters.

- Executive will submit internal request to Peeragarhi branch.

- Executive sent a video call link to customer's email.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to join video call for guidance.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product mismatch, filter, location, video call
